home.title: AmanVision
home.subtitle: AI vigilance, from home to construction site.
home.description: Leader in fall detection by computer vision. Secure your loved ones, your employees, and your customers with unmatched precision.
home.sectors_subtitle: From the privacy of a bedroom to the flows of an international station, AmanVision adapts to save lives.
home.sector1_desc: Benevolent vigilance in room and at home.
home.sector2_desc: Detection of falls from height and protection of lone workers.
home.proactive_desc_part1: On a construction site or in a mall, a fall can go unnoticed. AmanVision alerts your teams
home.engagement1_desc: No sensors to wear. Total freedom for seniors and workers.
home.engagement2_desc: Adapts to your existing security cameras in a few clicks.
home.engagement3_desc: Smart notifications sent to the right responders based on the zone.
